title: What can OCE achieve at Rift Rivals?

replies.body: {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} Our boys should have as much fun as they can while they're at RR. This is the first time this kind of event has taken place, Take em by storm boys! Show em the thunda down unda'!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
The experience of playing international teams might help develop their ability to make it to the worlds one day.
